user.title: Set up Kompromiss
user.description: Configure the sensors for temperature and electricity price.

thermal.title: Thermal Model Parameters
thermal.description: Configure the thermal characteristics of your building and heating system.

data_description.thermal_resistance: Thermal resistance between building and outdoor environment (K/W).
data_description.medium_to_building_thermal_resistance: Thermal resistance between heating medium and building (K/W).
data_description.medium_to_outdoor_thermal_resistance: Thermal resistance between heating medium and outdoor (K/W).
data_description.medium_thermal_capacity: Thermal mass of the heating medium/water loop (J/K).

mpc.title: MPC Control Parameters
mpc.description: Configure Model Predictive Control parameters and cost weights.

data_description.prediction_horizon: Number of time steps to predict ahead in MPC optimization.
data_description.time_step: Duration of each MPC prediction step (seconds).
data_description.temperature_deviation_penalty: Cost for deviating from target temperature. Higher = stays closer to target.
data_description.comfort_band_violation_penalty: Large penalty for violating min/max bounds. Should be much higher than deviation penalty.
data_description.energy_cost_penalty: Weight on electricity cost. Higher = more estimated energy cost savings.
data_description.simulated_outdoor_move_penalty: Penalizes rapid changes in control output. Higher = smoother operation.

heater.title: Heater / Heat Pump Settings
heater.description: Configure heater and heat pump parameters.

data_description.heater_thermal_power: Maximum heat output of the heat pump (W).
data_description.heat_curve_slope: Slope of the heat curve (negative value).

output.title: Simulated Outdoor Temperature Settings
output.description: Range and behavior of simulated outdoor temperature.

data_description.lowest_simulated_temperature: Minimum value for the simulated outdoor temperature (°C).
data_description.highest_simulated_temperature: Maximum value for the simulated outdoor temperature (°C). Set this below your heaters's summer mode threshold to prevent the circulation pump from stopping.
data_description.simulated_outdoor_move_penalty: Penalizes rapid changes in control output. Higher = smoother operation.

data_description.electricity_price_enabled: Enable integration with electricity price data to optimize heating based on energy costs.
data_description.electricity_price_area: Nordpool price area code (e.g., FI, LV, DK1, DK2, please refer to Nordpool).
data_description.electricity_price_currency: Currency code (EUR, DKK, NOK, PLN, or SEK). Please update control parameters since energy cost scaling will depend the numerical price value.
